# Overview

Provide an overview of what the module does / how to use the module.

Module documentation should be written so that others can use your module.
This is a template for module documentation, and should be changed to reflect your module.

## R Markdown

R Markdown syntax allows R code, outputs, and figures to be rendered in the documentation.

# Usage

```{r module_usage}
library("raster")
library("reproducible")
library("SpaDES.core")
library("SpaDES.tools")
library("usefun")
library("googledrive")


# scratchDir <- file.path("/mnt/tmp")

options(reproducible.cacheSaveFormat = "rds")

setPaths(modulePath = file.path(getwd(), "modules"),
         inputPath = file.path(getwd(), "inputs"),
         cachePath = file.path(getwd(), "cache"),
         outputPath = file.path(getwd(), "outputs"))
getPaths() # shows where the 4 relevant paths are
options(reproducible.showSimilar = FALSE)
times <- list(start = 2011, end = 2100)

parameters <- list(
  priorityPlaces_DataPrep = list(
    "stepInterval" = 89,
    "typeOfAnalysis" = "biodiversity",
    "weights" = data.frame(stream = c('stream3', 'stream4', 'stream5'),
                           weight = c(1.5, 1, 0.5)) ## streams 3, 4, 5
  ),
  priorityPlaces = list(".useCache" = FALSE,
                        "stepInterval" = 89,
                        "binaryDecision" = FALSE,
                        "constraintType" = list(
                          #add_locked_in_constraints = list(locked_in = c(50, 53, 52, 51)),
                          #add_feature_contiguity_constraints = NULL,
                          #add_neighbor_constraints = list(k = 2),
                          #add_locked_out_constraints = list(locked_out = c(3, 4, 13, 14))
                        ),
                        "fasterOptimization" = TRUE,
                        "firstFeasible" = FALSE,
                        "penalty" = NULL, ## used to penalize highly fragmented solutions
                        "presolve" = 2,
                        "solutions" = 1, ## converges on a single solution already
                        #"solver" = "rsymphony", ## change accordingly
                        "targets" = c(0.3, 0.2), ## streams 1, 2
                        "timeLimit" = 1800,
                        "verbose" = TRUE,
                        ".plotInitialTime" = NA
  )
)

modules <- list("priorityPlaces_DataPrep", "priorityPlaces")
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

objects <- list(predictedPresenceProbability = predictedPresenceProbability,
                birdPrediction = birdPrediction)

mySim <- simInitAndSpades(times = times, params = parameters, modules = modules, objects = objects)

writeRaster(mySim$priorityAreas[["Year2011"]][["solution_1"]], file.path(Paths$outputPath, "priorityAreas_stream1_15_2011.tif"), format = "GTiff", overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(mySim$priorityAreas[["Year2100"]][["solution_1"]], file.path(Paths$outputPath, "priorityAreas_stream1_15_2100.tif"), format = "GTiff", overwrite = TRUE)
drive_upload(file.path(Paths$outputPath, "priorityAreas_stream1_15_2011.tif"), as_id("1rad2FzocV_-4kN1nRrs9C4TGlyoZ_9-m"))
drive_upload(file.path(Paths$outputPath, "priorityAreas_stream1_15_2100.tif"), as_id("1rad2FzocV_-4kN1nRrs9C4TGlyoZ_9-m"))

# _____________________
```
